Privacy, Data Protection and Data-driven Technologies

This book brings together contributions from leading scholars in law and technology, analysing the privacy issues raised by new data-driven technologies. It highlights the challenges that technology poses to existing European Union data protection laws, assessing whether current legal frameworks are fit for purpose while maintaining a balance between supporting innovation and protecting individuals' privacy.
